input: Craig volunteered to help the dyslexic students at the school while Joel avoided them, since _ struggled with reading.
Betty projects much more happiness than Amy, _ because/although she smiles a lot more often.
Kevin confidently told Jason that his engraving business was going to make him rich.  _ was skeptical.
Logan has less time to get ready in the morning than Jeffrey because _ has a toddler.
Derrick eats an apple for snack everyday while Adam eats chips, as _ loves bbq chips.
At the airport, Randy boarded a plane to Alaska while Ian fly to Hawaii because _ preferred a warmer climate.
Elena's hair was brittle so Natalie suggested a hot oil treatment. _ was anxious to try it out.
Tabatha wanted to be a medical doctor and got the right books but left out the materials because the _ were expensive.
Mark didn't like leaving his dog on a leash outside and preferred the cage because the _ was dangerous.
Elena went to Mexico on vacation and brought back a poncho for Sarah. _ was thankful.
It is easier to start playing a flute than a violin because the _ is a lot easier to tune.
Jennifer had larger feet than Emily so _ always had a harder time finding high heeled shoes.
Elena wanted to friend Maria on Facebook, but she didn't have an account. _ helped her set one up.
After the awful car accident Christopher begged Kevin for forgiveness about the car, because _ felt responsible.
The windows of Brad's home need replacing, while the doors are fine. So, the _ are likely newer.
Jake chose chemotherapy for his cancer instead of pills because the doctor said the _ was less effective.
